narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Mindflex Outpatient Treatment Center LLC is a Community/Behavioral Health provider based in Tucson, AZ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $5.3M in Medicaid payments across 18K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $5.3M in Medicaid payments. While not among the largest billers, unusual patterns in providers of this size can still indicate systemic issues worth monitoring.
